faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Can't find the answer you are looking for?¬†Reach out to us
faq.description: Feel free to reach out to us for any questions and we will get back to you as soon as possible!

faq1.question: How does the QR menu work?
faq1.answer: Once you create your restaurant‚Äôs digital menu, we generate a unique QR code for you. Simply print and place it on tables or counters. Customers scan the QR code with their smartphones and instantly access your up-to-date menu‚Äîno apps needed!

faq2.question: Can customers place orders directly from the QR menu?
faq2.answer: Yes! With our QR Menu with Ordering feature, customers can browse, select items, and place orders directly from their phones. Orders are instantly sent to your admin dashboard, allowing you to manage them in real-time.

faq3.question: How does online ordering for delivery & takeaway work?
faq3.answer: We provide you with a custom online ordering page where customers can place orders for delivery or pickup. No third-party commissions‚Äîjust direct sales through your platform. Payments are processed securely via Stripe.

faq4.question: Do I need technical knowledge to set this up?
faq4.answer: Not at all! Our system is user-friendly and requires no coding skills. You can manage menus, orders, and settings easily from your admin dashboard.

faq5.question: How are payments processed?
faq5.answer: We integrate with Stripe to handle all payments securely. Customers can pay online, and funds go directly to your Stripe account.

faq6.question: Can I update my menu anytime?
faq6.answer: Yes! You can add, edit, or remove items instantly from your admin dashboard. Changes are updated in real-time, so your customers always see the latest version of your menu.

faq7.question: Is there a commission fee on my sales?
faq7.answer: No, we don‚Äôt take a percentage of your sales! You keep 100% of your earnings, minus standard Stripe processing fees.

faq8.question: Can I use this for multiple locations?
faq8.answer: Yes! If you own multiple restaurants or branches, you can manage them all from a single dashboard, with separate menus, QR codes, and settings for each location.

faq9.question: What if I need help setting up?
faq9.answer: Our support team is always here to help! We offer step-by-step guides and direct support to ensure your setup is smooth and hassle-free.

Real-Time Dashboard.title: Real-Time Dashboard
Real-Time Dashboard.desc: Effortlessly update menu items, descriptions, and prices with just a few clicks. No need to reprint menus‚Äîchanges reflect instantly across all customer devices.

Instant Digital Menu Access.title: Instant Digital Menu Access
Instant Digital Menu Access.desc: Guests simply scan a QR code to view the menu instantly on their smartphones. No app downloads required‚Äîjust fast, convenient, and touch-free browsing.

QR Menu.title: QR Menu
QR Menu.longTitle: QR Menu ‚Äì Instant Access, Effortless Browsing
QR Menu.desc: Say goodbye to printed menus and hello to a modern, hassle-free dining experience. With our QR Menu, your customers can simply scan a QR code using their smartphones and instantly access your digital menu‚Äîno downloads, no delays, no apps needed.
QR Menu.shortDesc: Let your customers scan a QR code and instantly access your digital menu‚Äîno apps, no hassle. Keep your menu always up-to-date while reducing printing costs.

steps.step1: Create & Customize Your Digital Menu - Once you create your account and choose your plan, you will be able to add and personalize your menu in no time.
steps.step2: Generate A Unique QR Code - Print and display on booklets, counters, or marketing materials.
steps.step3: Customers Scan & Browse - Customers can instantly access your menu on their phones by scanning the QR code.
steps.step4: Manage Your Menu With Ease - Control through a user-friendly admin panel, where you can update, edit, or remove items in real-time.

Smart Ordering QR Menu.title: Smart Ordering QR Menu
Smart Ordering QR Menu.longTitle: Smart QR Menu ‚Äì Seamless & Effortless Ordering
Smart Ordering QR Menu.desc: Take your QR Menu to the next level by allowing customers to browse, order, and pay directly from their phones. Enhance efficiency, reduce wait times, and improve the overall customer experience.
Smart Ordering QR Menu.shortDesc: Take your QR menu to the next level! Allow customers to browse your menu, place orders ‚Äî all without waiting for a waiter. Faster service, happier customers, and increased efficiency.

steps.step1: Setup The Menu - The interface simplifies the setup of the QR menu, with some extra configuration like stock & quantity or payment integration.
steps.step2: Browse & Select Items - Guests add items to their carts, select preferences, and place the order directly from their phones.
steps.step3: Order Sent To The Admin Panel - The order instantly appears in your admin dashboard, where you can manage and track it in real-time.
steps.step4: Fulfill Order - Once the order is completed by the staff.

Smart Self Service Menu.title: Smart Self Service Menu
Smart Self Service Menu.desc: Enhance your restaurant or caf√© with a QR ordering system! Customers can scan, order from their table, and only pick up their order when it‚Äôs ready‚Äîno waiting, no interruptions. Improve service efficiency while staying in full control.
Smart Self Service Menu.shortDesc: Customers can scan, order from their table, and only pick up their order when it‚Äôs ready‚Äîno waiting, no interruptions. Improve service efficiency while staying in full control.

steps.step1: Set Up Your Online Store - Customize your menu, pricing, and branding by following the exact same steps as setting up a QR menu.
steps.step2: Place Orders For Delivery Or Takeaway - Customers choose their preferred option and complete payment securely online.
steps.step3: Order Sent To The Admin Panel - The order instantly appears in your admin dashboard, where you can manage and track it in real-time.
steps.step4: Prepare & Fulfill Orders - Notify customers when their order is ready for pickup or out for delivery.
